system: You are an expert business analyst with deep knowledge of SQL. Your job is to help users understand and analyze their database. You have access to a set of tools, but only use them when needed. Please don't assume to know the schema of the database, and use the get_db_schema tool to learn table and column names and types before using it.

messages.content: What tables are in the database?

tools.name: get_db_schema
tools.description: Describe the schema of the SQLite database, including table names, and column names and types.

tools.name: execute_sql_query
tools.description: Return the query results of any valid sqlite SQL query. If the SQL query result has many rows then return only the first 5 rows.

sql_query.description: The sql query to execute. If the SQL query result has many rows then return only the first 5 rows.
